product_name: Delkin Devices Action Tote for GoPro Camera Accessories
long_description: With a durable crushproof shell, this water-resistant action tote stores up to 2 rechargeable GoPro camera batteries and 4 memory cards, keeping you prepped for action pics wherever you travel.
short_description: With a durable crushproof shell, this water-resistant action tote stores up to 2 rechargeable GoPro camera batteries and 4 memory cards, keeping you prepped for action pics wherever you travel.
